Class HelperFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.HelperFunction

  • public class HelperFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    HelperFunction is a utility class for the Heros And Villians application. It contains proceedures that were repeated numerous times throughout.
    Author:
    Adam Conway, Flynn Doherty

      • chance

        public static boolean chance(int odds)
        Parameters:
        odds - is the "1 in x" chance, where x is the integer value of odds.
        Returns:
        whether the player has succeeded or failed the pseudo random odds calculation.
